extensionAttribute.displayName: Adobe Creative Cloud - Device License Present
extensionAttribute.description:
This Extension Attribute determines if there is an Adobe Creative Cloud License serial number present.
This script requires the AdobeExpiryCheck binary to work.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash # # Written by Neil Martin - 2018-11-29 # # This script determines if there is an Adobe Creative Cloud License serial number present. # # This script requires the AdobeExpiryCheck binary to work # Get it from https://helpx.adobe.com/enterprise/kb/volume-license-expiration-check.html # ########### # # Edit the variables below as needed: # # Set $product to 'Acrobat' for Adobe Acrobat, or 'CreativeCloud' for Creative Cloud # Set $toolpath to the path where the AdobeExpiryCheck binary is installed
product=CreativeCloud toolpath="/usr/local/bin"
# Do not edit below this line
if [[ ! -e "$toolpath"/AdobeExpiryCheck ]]; then echo "<result>"AdobeExpiryCheck not found"</result>" exit 0 fi
rawdate=$("$toolpath"/AdobeExpiryCheck | grep "$product" | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' | tail -c 9)
if [[ "$rawdate" == "" ]]; then echo "<result>No</result>" exit 0 else echo "<result>Yes</result>" fi
exit 0
